ee nimiththen walukaramaye di mema 21 wana da sarwa rathrika parithrana dharma deshanawa da, 25 wana da ganadewi prathimawa ragath perahara bambalapitiya kadireshan kowila dakwa gaman karanu labe. 23 wana da kolambaa rajakiya widyalaye sita mal perahara wiharasthanaya dakwa da, 24 wana da mahanama widyalaya magin sanwidhanaya karana mal perahara wiharasthanaya wetha gaman kirima da, 25 wana da tharstan widyalaya sanwidhanaya karana mal perahara wiharasthanaya wetha gaman kirima da we. 26 wana da kadireshan kowile sita ganadewi prathimawa ragath perahara wiharasthanaya wetha gaman karana athara kollupitiya polis sthanaya mangin sanwidhanaya karana mal perahara da edina wiharasthanaya wetha gaman karanu labe.
